fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY 6M CAD Diff
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down All CCY 6M CAD] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
